channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SICAM A8000 CP-8031
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SICAM A8000 CP-8031

item.title: CVE-2022-27480|2024-08-03T05:25:32.710Z -- siemens -- sicam%20a8000%20cp-8031
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SICAM A8000 CP-8031 (All versions < V4.80), SICAM A8000 CP-8050 (All versions < V4.80). Affected devices do not require an user to be authenticated to access certain files. This could allow unauthenticated attackers to download these files.
